modName: More lush and re-sized plants and grasses ML-RPG
summary:
Now this is the mod which will make your game like a real forest........
                  *Must download*
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]
SO guys in my previous mod i had made the aspen trees more lush and bigger..
                But now not only the aspen but the whole skyrim will be more lush and and will make you feel like a real forest
[/size]
[size=5]
What i have done....
[/size]
[color=green]
[size=3]
1.I have re-sized all the grasses and plants..
2.All the plants and grasses are more lush and will make you feel like a real forest
3.At some places the underwater  plants will seems to come out of water ,,which looks really    awesome 
4.It is fully compatible with vurt\"s flora overhaul
5.I will do the remaining work for trees later {in new version}
[/size]
[/color]
**************************************************************************************************************************************
[size=5]water plants[/size]
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/16101-1-1335714855.jpg[/img]

**************************************************************************************************************************************

[color=green]
[size=4]
--Their are no performance issues,But i recommend high end pc..As because of the size     increase their will be bit more use of your pc
---Most of the places will be highly forested.
--If any problem please contact or comment..
---I am working on trees so in next update i will upload the trees file
[/size]
[/color]

[size=5] Some difference photos[/size]

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/15067-1-1335362761.jpg[/img]

********************************************************************************************************************************************
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/15067-1-1335362552.jpg[/img]

I hope you all will like my mod and will endrose.....
author: Hritik
